alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL NUECES AND SOUTHEASTERN SAN PATRICIO COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT... At 931 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Del Mar College Windward Campus, or near Corpus Christi International Airport, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Corpus Christi International Airport, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Gregory, Ingleside On The Bay, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Corpus Christi Country Club, Cabaniss Field, Bay Area Medical Center, Cole Park, Spohn Hospital South, Driscoll Childrens Hospital, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Clarkwood, Annaville, La Palmera Mall, and Tuloso. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 14. US Highway 181 between mile markers 638 and 640. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; Nueces Islands
